relevant_findings.general: Well-appearing man in NAD, laying flat, comfortable, appropriate.
relevant_findings.neck: Supple, no thyromegaly, no JVD, no carotid bruits.
relevant_findings.heart: S1 & S2 irregular, no murmurs appreciated.
relevant_findings.lungs: Pectus deformity; respirations short with possible accessory muscle use; limited air movement; crackles at both lung bases regardless of positioning.
relevant_findings.abdomen: Distended, tender to palpation with guarding & rebound worse in epigastrium. BS present. No echymoses.
relevant_findings.skin: No rashes or lesions appreciated, scars from various surgical procedures.
relevant_findings.neuro: Awake, A&Ox3, CNs II-XII grossly intact.
